text:
Sorry <@U795QFHDE> I have been on holidays and totally missed it  :slightly_smiling_face:
Could you fix that?
the if statement should be the following syntax `{% if row.location.lat %}` with the percentages. You shouldn't need the is defined either.
oh wow... I knew it was going to be a simple answer.
Of course none of my expression tests were working.
Stefen... I owe you a beer
